sentences.sContent: ...But the 1980s broughtnew competition from Japanese film company Fuji Photo...
...What do we learn about the Japanese concerning gift-giving...
...If you ask Japanese students to list the positive attributes they expect in a romantic partner...
...But the 1980s brought new competition from Japanese film company Fuji Photo...
...Japanese listeners sometimes close their eyes to enhance concentration...
...she was confused to see that many of her Japanese listeners have their eyes closed...
...an American artist was giving a speech on the art of Japanese brush painting to an audience that included visitors from Japan...
...Were they tuned off because an American had the nerve to instruct Japanese in their own art form...
...Why do Japanese listeners sometimes close their eyes while listening to a speech...
...Cruises have become very popular with the Japanese both for holidays and for business conferences...

phrases.pCn: 流行性乙型脑炎；日本乙型脑炎

trans.tranOther: relating to Japan, its people, or its language
